title: Ticket #5730: Make node job ClassAd visible to DAGMan POST script
description:
Miron today expressed a desire to have a node job's ClassAd visible to its POST script. (I didn't think of this during our discussion, but the POST script can access the ClassAd via condor_history. I'm not sure if that would satisfy what Miron wants or not.)

I'd have to think about what a good way would be to do this -- the first thing that comes to mind is that we could have a $(CLASSAD_FILE) argument to the post script, and DAGMan would write a file with the relevant ClassAd, and fill in the file name as the argument. (One issue with that is garbage-collecting the ClassAd files.)

(One problem with using condor_history is that it may not work real well for node jobs with multiple procs. If we did the file method, I guess the file could contain the ClassAds for all of the procs, so that might work a little better.)
